00008 #include "CSaveMenu.h"
00009 #include "CBaseMenu.h"
00010 #include "CConfirmMenu.h"
00011 #include "../../sdl/CInput.h"
00012 
00013 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }
00014 
00015 CSaveMenu::CSaveMenu(Uint8 dlg_theme, CSavedGame &SavedGame) :
00016 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00017 mp_OverwriteMenu(NULL),
00018 m_SavedGame(SavedGame),
00019 m_overwrite(false)
00020 {
00021  std::string text;
00022  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(22, 22, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN, m_dlg_theme);
00023  m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00024 
00025  // Load the state-file list
00026  std::vector<std::string> StateFileList = m_SavedGame.getSlotList();
00027 
00028  for(Uint32 i=1;i<=20;i++)
00029  {
00030   text = "";
00031   if(i <= StateFileList.size())
00032   {
00033    text = StateFileList.at(i-1);
00034    mp_Dialog->m_name = text;
00035   }
00036   if(text == "")
00037    text = EMPTY_STRING;
00038   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, i, text);
00039  }
00040 }
00041 
00042 void CSaveMenu::processSpecific()
00043 {
00044  if(!mp_OverwriteMenu)
00045  {
00046   if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION )
00047   {
00048    if( mp_Dialog->getInputMode(INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN) )
00049    {
00050     if( m_SavedGame.getSlotList().size() > m_selection )
00051      mp_Dialog->m_name = m_SavedGame.getSlotList().at(m_selection);
00052 
00053     if( m_SavedGame.getSlotList().size() > m_selection && mp_Dialog->m_name != EMPTY_STRING )
00054     {
00055      mp_OverwriteMenu = new CConfirmMenu("Overwrite?", m_overwrite, m_dlg_theme);
00056      m_suspended = true;
00057     }
00058     else
00059     {
00060      mp_Dialog->m_name = "";
00061      mp_Dialog->m_length = 15;
00062      mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_TEXT);
00063     }
00064 
00065    }
00066    else if ( mp_Dialog->getInputMode(INPUT_MODE_TEXT) && g_pInput->getPressedKey(KENTER) )
00067    {
00068     if(mp_Dialog->m_name == "")
00069      mp_Dialog->m_name = "Untitled";
00070     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(m_selection, mp_Dialog->m_name);
00071 
00072     m_SavedGame.prepareSaveGame(m_selection+1, mp_Dialog->m_name);
00073     m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00074     mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN);
00075    }
00076   }
00077  }
00078  else
00079  {
00080   mp_OverwriteMenu->processCommon();
00081   mp_OverwriteMenu->processSpecific();
00082   mp_OverwriteMenu->postProcess();
00083 
00084   if(mp_OverwriteMenu->mustClose())
00085   {
00086    SAFE_DELETE(mp_OverwriteMenu);
00087    m_suspended = false;
00088    mp_Dialog->m_length = 15;
00089 
00090    if(m_overwrite)
00091    {
00092     mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_TEXT);
00093    }
00094    else
00095    {
00096     mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN);
00097     m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00098    }
00099 
00100   }
00101  }
00102 }
00103 
00104 CSaveMenu::~CSaveMenu()
00105 {
00106  if(mp_Dialog) delete mp_Dialog;
00107  mp_Dialog = NULL;
00108 }
